subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Boston’s David Ortiz has looked unsteady and has not frightened many pitchers lately. He has one home run in 10 games, or one fewer than Yankees outfielder Melky Cabrera.
snippet: Boston’s David Ortiz has looked unsteady and has not frightened many pitchers lately. He has one home run in 10 games, or one fewer than Yankees outfielder Melky Cabrera.
